short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension customizes Podio experience in Local Tobacco

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Local Tobacco is a multidisciplinary branding and digital creative agency, which based in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. We are making use of Podio for all of our company and project management. We use this extension to enhance our experience with Podio by modifying some of their user interface.
